languages.text: "Милость Императора да не оставит верных слуг Его!" — голос ван Калокса словно отточенный нож рассек полог смятения, что был наброшен неведомой рукой на отважных исследователей. Глаза псайкера мягко сияли в полумраке — касание его колдовских сил изгнало из душ людей скверну слабости, и жуткий голос исчез, словно его и не было. Перегруппировавшись, разведчики отступили к шаттлу.

traits.locale_text: "Милость Императора да не оставит верных слуг его!" — голос ван Калокса словно отточенный нож рассек полог смятения, что был наброшен неведомой рукой на отважных исследователей. Глаза псайкера мягко сияли в полумраке — касание его колдовских сил изгнало из душ людей скверну слабости, и жуткий голос исчез, словно его и не было. Перегруппировавшись, разведчики отступили к шаттлу.

languages.text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

"Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

languages.text: «¡Oh, Emperador misericordioso, no abandones ahora a tus fieles!». La voz de van Calox atravesó el pánico que rodeaba a los exploradores como una red lanzada por una mano invisible. Los ojos del psíquico brillaban levemente en la penumbra. El toque de su brujería expulsó la lacra de la debilidad de las almas de los exploradores y la voz siniestra desapareció como si nunca hubiera existido. Tras reagruparse, el equipo regresó a la lanzadera.
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, Emperador misericordioso, no abandones ahora a tus fieles!». La voz de van Calox atravesó el pánico que rodeaba a los exploradores como una red lanzada por una mano invisible. Los ojos del psíquico brillaban levemente en la penumbra. El toque de su brujería expulsó la lacra de la debilidad de las almas de los exploradores y la voz siniestra desapareció como si nunca hubiera existido. Tras reagruparse, el equipo regresó a la lanzadera.

languages.text: “仁慈的帝皇在上，请不要抛弃你忠诚的仆人们！”恐慌仿佛看不见的手撒下的巨网，将勇敢的士兵们笼罩其中，但冯·卡洛克斯尖锐的声音却刺破了这张恐慌之网。他的双眼在黑暗中闪烁着柔和的光芒，他的触碰带着灵能之力，驱离了士兵们灵魂中的软弱。邪恶的声音消失了，仿佛从来没有响起过一样。队员们重新集结好之后，退回到了穿梭机上。
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: “仁慈的帝皇在上，请不要抛弃你忠诚的仆人们！”恐慌仿佛看不见的手撒下的巨网，将勇敢的士兵们笼罩其中，但冯·卡洛克斯尖锐的声音却刺破了这张恐慌之网。他的双眼在黑暗中闪烁着柔和的光芒，他的触碰带着灵能之力，驱离了士兵们灵魂中的软弱。邪恶的声音消失了，仿佛从来没有响起过一样。队员们重新集结好之后，退回到了穿梭机上。

languages.text: 「皇帝よご慈悲を、忠臣たちを見捨てないでください！」ヴァン・カロックスの声は、見えざる手によって投げかけられた網のように、勇敢な偵察兵たちに降りかかったパニックを鋭く切り裂いた。異能者の目は暗闇の中でふわりと輝く。彼の魔術が触れて偵察兵の魂から弱さという汚れを追い払い、邪悪な声はまるで存在しなかったかのように消えた。再編成した後、チームはシャトルまで後退した。
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝よご慈悲を、忠臣たちを見捨てないでください！」ヴァン・カロックスの声は、見えざる手によって投げかけられた網のように、勇敢な偵察兵たちに降りかかったパニックを鋭く切り裂いた。異能者の目は暗闇の中でふわりと輝く。彼の魔術が触れて偵察兵の魂から弱さという汚れを追い払い、邪悪な声はまるで存在しなかったかのように消えた。再編成した後、チームはシャトルまで後退した。

languages.text: "Gnade, Imperator, verlasst jetzt nicht Eure treuen Diener!" Die Stimme von van Calox durchschnitt scharf die Panik, die sich auf die tapferen Späher herabgesenkt hatte wie ein Netz, geworfen von einer unsichtbaren Hand. Die Augen des Psionikers leuchteten leicht in der Düsternis – seine Magie vertrieb den Makel der Schwäche aus den Seelen der Späher, und die unheimliche Stimme verschwand, als wäre sie nie da gewesen. Das Team sammelte sich und kehrte zum Shuttle zurück.
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: "Gnade, Imperator, verlasst jetzt nicht Eure treuen Diener!" Die Stimme von van Calox durchschnitt scharf die Panik, die sich auf die tapferen Späher herabgesenkt hatte wie ein Netz, geworfen von einer unsichtbaren Hand. Die Augen des Psionikers leuchteten leicht in der Düsternis – seine Magie vertrieb den Makel der Schwäche aus den Seelen der Späher, und die unheimliche Stimme verschwand, als wäre sie nie da gewesen. Das Team sammelte sich und kehrte zum Shuttle zurück.

languages.text: « Ô Empereur miséricordieux, n'abandonnez pas vos fidèles serviteurs dans la détresse ! » s'exclama van Calox, dont les yeux luisaient doucement dans l'obscurité. Comme un couteau affûté, sa supplique coupa court à la panique qui s'était abattue sur les courageux éclaireurs comme un filet lancé par une main invisible. Le contact de son pouvoir chassa la faiblesse qui s'était insinuée dans leur âme, et la voix sinistre disparut comme si elle ne s'était jamais fait entendre. Après avoir pris un instant pour se ressaisir, l'équipe retourna à la navette.
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: « Ô Empereur miséricordieux, n'abandonnez pas vos fidèles serviteurs dans la détresse ! » s'exclama van Calox, dont les yeux luisaient doucement dans l'obscurité. Comme un couteau affûté, sa supplique coupa court à la panique qui s'était abattue sur les courageux éclaireurs comme un filet lancé par une main invisible. Le contact de son pouvoir chassa la faiblesse qui s'était insinuée dans leur âme, et la voix sinistre disparut comme si elle ne s'était jamais fait entendre. Après avoir pris un instant pour se ressaisir, l'équipe retourna à la navette.

languages.text: "İmparator'un rahmeti üzerimize olsun. Sadık hizmetkârlarından merhametini esirgemesin!" Panik, görünmez bir el tarafından atılan ağ misali birlikleri ele geçirirken van Calox'un sesi yükseldi. Ruhsezerin gözleri, karanlığın kalbinde bir çakmak gibi hafifçe parladı. Keşif erlerinin yüreğine sürülen zafiyet kara lekesi, sahirliğin etkisiyle temizlendi. Habis ses ise hiç var olmamışçasına ortadan kayboldu. Toparlanan birlik, mekiğe doğru geri çekildi.
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy, do not forsake your loyal servants now!" Van Calox's voice cut sharply through the panic that had descended upon the brave scouts like a net cast by an unseen hand. The psyker's eyes gleamed softly in the gloom — the touch of his sorcery drove the taint of weakness from the scouts' souls, and the sinister voice vanished as if it had never been there. After regrouping, the team retreated to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un rahmeti üzerimize olsun. Sadık hizmetkârlarına merhamet eyle!" Panik, görünmez bir el tarafından atılan ağ misali, birlikleri ele geçirirken Van Calox'un sesi yükseldi. Ruhsezerin gözleri, karanlığın kalbinde bir çakmak gibi hafifçe parladı. Birliklerin yüreğine sürülen zafiyet kara lekesi, sahirliğin etkisiyle temizlendi. Habis ses ise hiç var olmamışçasına ortadan kayboldu. Toparlanan birlik, mekiğe doğru geri çekildi.
